outputs.output_descr: 1- Support to the Economic Statistics unit; 2 - Support to the Demographic & Social Statistics unit; 3- Support to the Research and Capacity Building unit; 4- Support to the Management Information Systems unit;

project_descr: The project aims to strengthen the capacity of national institute of statistics fo Rwanda. NISR tracks and monitors the economic development and poverty reduction performance indicators.
project_title: Support the National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda
